doc:
Martin Lawrence https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martin_Lawrence 0 Martin Fitzgerald Lawrence (born April 16, 1965) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, producer, talk show host, and writer. Lawrence came to fame during the 1990s, establishing a Hollywood career as a leading actor, most notably in the Fox television sitcom Martin and the films House Party, Boomerang, Bad Boys, Wild Hogs, Nothing to Lose, Blue Streak, Life, Big Momma's House, and A Thin Line Between Love Hate. Martin_Fitzgerald_Lawrence ( born April_16_,_1965 ) is an_American_stand-up_comedian , actor , producer , talk_show_host , and writer . Lawrence came to fame during the_1990s , establishing a_Hollywood_career as a_leading_actor , most_notably in the_Fox_television_sitcom_Martin and the_films_House_Party , Boomerang , Bad_Boys , Wild_Hogs , Nothing to_Lose , Blue_Streak , Life , Big_Momma 's_House , and A_Thin_Line Between Love_ .
